name: Ikarus
detailed_description:
Ikarus is a tool for creating and building your own world. Unlike other world-building tools however, Ikarus provides you a completely customisable experience with near infinite possibilities for the way you structure your data.

For any information you can check out our website on the sidebar.

We're a team of two, with the support of some friends - it's a passion project of mine and I'm creating this not only for others, but for myself as well.
The project is in a very early stage, and only the fundamental features are implemented.
As for where we are, and where we want to go, Ikarus includes a roadmap which shows the end goal we're trying to achieve.

We have opted for an open beta to maximise the amount of feedback we can get, and avoid differentiating the accessibility between supporters and people who just want to see what it is.

While we're at the topic of supporters, I love working on Ikarus and have done so for the past few months without any monetary benefits. Still, money can go a long way in both ensuring this project will go where it is supposed to, and determine the speed at which it does so. The best place to support us is at our Patreon.

Have you got any questions, suggestions or just want to chat to other people using Ikarus to share your experience, or perhaps talk a bit with the devs?
Come find this and more on our Discord!

short_description: Ever wanted to create your own world? Keep track of your P&P campaigns? Are you working as a worldbuilder and find it troublesome to keep track of lots of relevant data or simply want to share that data in an accessible way? Well look no further than Ikarus!
